sentences.en: Based upon actual BOF, the geometric model is set up.
sentences.cn: 根据实际转炉建立几何模型.

sentences.en: By using an incremental approach, the problems involving material or geometric nonlinearity have been solved.
sentences.cn: 借应用一种增量方法, 已经解决了包括材料的或几何的非线性问题.

sentences.en: Clearly the virtual rotation about A is the geometric equivalent of taking moments about A.
sentences.cn: 显然绕A的虚转动在几何上等价于对A点取矩.

sentences.en: Geometric designs were popular wall decorations in the 14th century.
sentences.cn: 14世纪，几何图形是风靡一时的墙壁装饰图案。

sentences.en: Geometry is an important mathematic subject and geometric word - problem is a k.
sentences.cn: 几何是一门重要的数学学科,几何应用题是几何学中一种重要的题型.

sentences.en: Held is also hostile to geometric abstraction, in particular Minimalism, because of its reductiveness and flatness.
sentences.cn: 赫尔德也讨厌几何的抽象形态, 特别是具有抽象艺术性和单调性的极少主义.

sentences.en: Keywords: geometric nonlinearity, sag effect, equivalent modulus of elasticity, vehicle - bridge interaction.
sentences.cn: 关键词: 几何非线性 、 中垂效应 、 等效弹性系数 、 车桥互制.

sentences.en: Many pictures have been based on simple geometric designs.
sentences.cn: 许多画都是基于简单的几何图案。

sentences.en: Population can increase in a geometric ratio.
sentences.cn: 人口可以按几何级数增长.

sentences.en: She went out into the street, geometric blocks of hot , glassy light and concrete shadow.
sentences.cn: 她出来到街上, 见到一块块是几何图案的热辣辣的, 亮晶晶的阳光和实实在在的阴影.

sentences.en: The drastic reduction in the geometric dimension leads to great simplification in mathematical analysis.
sentences.cn: 几何维数的急剧减少导致数字分析的极大简化.

sentences.en: The pattern has bands of geometric shapes along with flowers and leaves.
sentences.cn: 这种模式已经随着花和叶的几何形状的乐队.

sentences.en: The ringed space is a recent development of the geometric function theory.
sentences.cn: 赋环空间是几何函数论的最新发展.
这些结果可与阿基米德斯的几何定理相比.

sentences.en: This new concept is the ternary nine - dimensional geometric system.
sentences.cn: 这个新概念就是三元九维几何体系.

words.tran_cn: 用几何学；几何学上地；按几何级数地
[植保] 尺蠖（一种虫子，行动时身体弯成弧状）；几何学者

phrases.tran_cn: 几何造型；几何建模；图形表示法；形状记述法

trans.tran_cn: 几何学的，成几何级数增减的，几何装饰的
trans.tran_en: having or using the shapes and lines in  geometry  , such as circles or squares, especially when these are arranged in regular patterns

trans.tran_cn: 几何级数， 等比级数
